catalogue_raissonne:
van Somenen 1888 4138b
Hollstein 99
Muller II 1853 undescribed
description: half-length portrait of Johannes Peeters seated facing slightly left, looking back at viewer; wearing rove with flat white lace collar; holding a drawing of a ship in PR hand and gesturing to it with PL hand; seated in front of a column
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet in black: 84  IOANNES PEETERS / five lines in French \'Tres bon peintre ...né \'an 1624\' / Luc. Vosterman iunior delinauit et sculp. | on sheet in pencil: 2-192
title: Portrait of Joannes Peeters
